back.workoutDescription: Advanced back extension exercise combining strength and flexibility
back.workoutExplanation: Start lying prone, extend arms forward. Press palms down and lift upper body, creating a long arc. Keep legs active and hip bones grounded. Hold for 3-5 breaths, focusing on length through spine. This exercise strengthens entire back while improving spinal mobility.

back.workoutDescription: Seated rotation exercise for spinal mobility and back strength
back.workoutExplanation: Sit tall with legs extended wide, arms at shoulder height. Rotate torso side to side while maintaining upright posture. Keep hips stable and spine long. This exercise improves thoracic mobility and strengthens deep back muscles.

back.workoutDescription: Dynamic exercise for full back engagement and coordination
back.workoutExplanation: Lie prone, lift arms and legs off mat. Alternate opposite arm and leg lifts in a swimming motion. Maintain steady breathing and core engagement. This exercise strengthens entire posterior chain while improving coordination.

Kneel and sit back on heels, extend arms forward. Round spine and reach forward, creating length. Focus on breathing into back expansion. This exercise provides gentle stretch and promotes spinal mobility.
Start on hands and knees. Alternate between spinal flexion (Cat) and extension (Cow). Coordinate movement with breath. This exercise improves spinal mobility and strengthens core-back connection.
Lie prone with arms by sides. Lift chest and arms, reaching back toward feet. Keep legs active and neck neutral. This exercise strengthens entire back while improving posture.

back.workoutDescription: Massage and mobility exercise for spine
back.workoutExplanation: Balance on tailbone, holding backs of thighs. Roll back and return to balance, maintaining ball shape. This exercise massages spine while improving control and balance.

back.workoutDescription: Rotation and flexion exercise for spine
back.workoutExplanation: Sit with legs wide, rotate torso and reach to opposite foot. Add spinal flexion while maintaining rotation. This exercise combines flexibility with strength in rotational movement.

back.workoutDescription: Dynamic back strengthening with leg engagement
back.workoutExplanation: Lie prone, hands clasped behind back. Kick heels to buttocks three times, then extend and lift chest. This exercise combines back strength with hamstring flexibility.
Lie prone, extend arms forward. Lift chest while sweeping arms back, like swimming breaststroke. This exercise strengthens back while promoting shoulder mobility.

back.workoutDescription: Gentle massage and mobility exercise for spine
back.workoutExplanation: Balance on tailbone with knees pulled to chest. Rock gently back and forth along spine. This exercise promotes spinal mobility and releases tension.
Alternate between Child's Pose and prone extension. Focus on smooth transitions and breath coordination. This exercise improves spinal flexibility and strength.

abs.workoutExplanation: Lie supine, lift head and legs, pump arms while maintaining hollow position. Complete 100 pumps with coordinated breathing. This exercise builds core strength and endurance.
Lie supine, extend arms overhead. Roll up one vertebra at a time, reaching forward over legs. Roll back down with control. This exercise strengthens abs and improves spinal mobility.
Lie supine, knees hugged to chest. Extend arms and legs simultaneously, then return to start. Focus on maintaining core engagement. This exercise improves coordination and strengthens core.
Lie supine, hands behind head. Alternate elbow to opposite knee, extending other leg. Maintain a smooth, controlled motion. This exercise strengthens obliques and enhances rotation.

abs.workoutDescription: Full-body stability and core endurance exercise
abs.workoutExplanation: Hold a straight line from head to heels in plank position. Keep core engaged and shoulders over wrists. This exercise builds core strength and stability.
Lie supine, legs at tabletop. Roll up to balance on sitting bones with legs extended. Roll back down with control. This exercise improves core strength and control.
Lie supine, one leg extended upward. Make small controlled circles while keeping hips stable. Switch legs. This exercise strengthens lower abs and enhances hip mobility.
Balance on one forearm and side of foot. Keep body in a straight line. This exercise strengthens obliques and improves core stability.

abs.workoutDescription: Dynamic hamstring stretch with core engagement
abs.workoutExplanation: Lie supine, one leg extended upward. Switch legs in a scissor-like motion, keeping core engaged. This exercise stretches hamstrings while strengthening core.
Start in a seated pike position. Roll back, lift hips, and roll back to pike. This exercise strengthens abs and enhances spinal mobility.
Lie supine, hands behind head. Alternate opposite elbow to knee in a pedaling motion. This exercise targets obliques and improves core endurance.
Start in plank. Lift hips to a pike position, then return to plank. This exercise builds core strength while improving flexibility.

legs.workoutExplanation: Step forward with one foot, lowering hips until both knees are at 90 degrees. Return to start and switch legs. This exercise strengthens quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
Start in a plank position. Lift one leg off the ground, keeping body stable. Lower and switch legs. This exercise strengthens thighs and improves balance.
Lie supine, feet hip-width apart. Lift hips to form a straight line from knees to shoulders. Lower back down. This exercise targets glutes and hamstrings.

legs.workoutDescription: Hip mobility and thigh strengthening exercise
legs.workoutExplanation: Lie on one side, top leg extended. Make small circles with top leg, keeping core stable. Switch sides. This exercise improves hip mobility and tones thighs.
Stand against a wall, slide down until knees form a 90-degree angle. Hold the position. This exercise builds strength in quads and endurance.
Stand tall, rise onto balls of feet, then lower back down. Repeat with control. This exercise strengthens calves and improves ankle stability.
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower hips back and down, then return to standing. Keep chest lifted. This exercise targets quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
Start on hands and knees. Extend one leg back and up. Lower with control, then switch sides. This exercise targets glutes and hamstrings.
Step onto a raised surface with one foot, then bring the other foot up. Step back down and switch legs. This exercise strengthens thighs and glutes.

legs.workoutDescription: Lateral leg and hip strengthening exercise
legs.workoutExplanation: Step to the side, bending one knee while keeping the other leg straight. Return to center and switch sides. This exercise strengthens inner and outer thighs.
Stand on one leg, hinge at hips to lower torso while extending the other leg back. Return to standing. This exercise strengthens hamstrings and improves balance.

glutes.workoutExplanation: Start on hands and knees. Kick one leg up and back, keeping knee bent. Lower and repeat on the other side. This exercise targets glutes.
Perform a glute bridge and alternate lifting one foot off the floor. Keep hips stable. This exercise strengthens glutes and engages the core.

glutes.workoutDescription: Outer glute and hip strengthening exercise
glutes.workoutExplanation: Lie on one side, legs stacked. Lift the top leg, keeping hips stable. Lower and repeat. This exercise strengthens glutes and improves hip stability.

glutes.workoutDescription: Single-leg glute and quad strengthening exercise
glutes.workoutExplanation: Place one foot on a raised surface behind you. Lower hips until the front knee is at 90 degrees. Return to standing. This exercise builds strength and balance.
Sit against a bench, shoulders supported. Push hips up to form a straight line from shoulders to knees. Lower and repeat. This exercise isolates glutes.
Start on hands and knees. Lift one knee out to the side while keeping hips stable. Lower and repeat on the other side. This exercise targets glute medius.
Step onto a raised surface, then extend the other leg back in a kick. Return to start and switch legs. This exercise strengthens glutes and hamstrings.

glutes.workoutDescription: Inner and outer glute strengthening exercise
glutes.workoutExplanation: Lie on one side with knees bent. Lift the top knee while keeping feet together. Lower and repeat. This exercise strengthens glutes and stabilizes hips.
Lie on your back, feet together and knees apart. Perform small glute bridges with hips. This exercise activates and strengthens glutes.

glutes.workoutDescription: Wide-stance squat for glute and inner thigh activation
glutes.workoutExplanation: Stand with feet wider than shoulders, toes pointing out. Lower hips into a squat. Return to standing. This exercise targets glutes and inner thighs.
Perform a glute bridge with a resistance band around thighs. Push knees outward against the band. This exercise strengthens glutes and improves stability.

glutes.workoutDescription: Glute and hamstring focus with single-leg support
glutes.workoutExplanation: Hinge at hips while keeping one leg slightly bent behind for balance. Return to standing. This exercise strengthens glutes and improves balance.
Step one leg back into a lunge position, then return to standing. Switch legs. This exercise strengthens glutes, quads, and hamstrings.
Place a resistance band around thighs. Step side-to-side while maintaining tension in the band. This exercise strengthens glutes and improves hip stability.

arms.workoutExplanation: Start in a plank position. Lower body until elbows are at 90 degrees, then push back up. This exercise strengthens chest, arms, and shoulders.
Sit on a bench, hands next to hips. Lower hips by bending elbows, then push back up. This exercise targets triceps and shoulders.

arms.workoutDescription: Dynamic stability and arm strength exercise
arms.workoutExplanation: In a plank position, lift one hand to tap the opposite shoulder. Alternate sides while keeping hips stable. This exercise strengthens shoulders and core.
Hold weights or resistance bands. Curl hands toward shoulders while keeping elbows close to body. This exercise strengthens biceps.
Start in a forearm plank. Push up into a full plank one arm at a time, then lower back. This exercise builds strength in arms and shoulders.
Hold a weight overhead with both hands. Lower it behind the head, then extend back up. This exercise targets triceps.
Start in a plank holding dumbbells. Pull one dumbbell toward your waist while keeping stable. Alternate arms. This exercise strengthens arms, shoulders, and back.
Perform a side plank. Extend top arm under the torso and return to start. This exercise strengthens arms and obliques.
Place hands close together in a diamond shape under the chest. Perform push-ups. This exercise targets triceps and chest.
Move from a forearm plank to a full plank position, alternating arms. Lower back down and repeat. This exercise strengthens arms, shoulders, and core.
Hold dumbbells at shoulder height with palms facing you. Rotate palms outward while pressing weights overhead, then return to start. This exercise targets shoulders and arms.

arms.workoutDescription: Triceps and posterior chain strengthening exercise
arms.workoutExplanation: Sit on the floor, hands behind hips. Lift hips to form a straight line from shoulders to heels. Hold this position to strengthen triceps and the back.
Hold weights at your sides. Raise arms laterally to shoulder height, then lower back down. This exercise strengthens the shoulders.
